Label: new shoot system
Text definition: A vegetative shoot system that does not yet have any unfolded true leaves.

Label: new shoot system emerging from ground
new shoot system emerging from ground in first growth cycle
new shoot system emerging from ground in later growth cycle
dormant leaf bud
Text definition: A vegetative bud that is participating in a bud dormancy process.

Label: non-dormant leaf bud
Text definition: A vegetative bud that is not participating in a bud dormancy process.

Label: swelling leaf bud
Text definition: A non-dormant leaf bud that is in the bud swell stage.

Label: breaking leaf bud
Text definition: A non-dormant leaf bud that is in the bud burst stage.
Comments: If a breaking leaf bud is present, it implies that a new shoot system and unfolding true leaf are also present and observable, hence the “subclass of” axiom.

Label: true leaf
Text definition: A vascular leaf that is not a cotyledon.

Label: unfolding true leaf
Text definition: An expanding true leaf that is in the vascular leaf unfolding stage.

Label: unfolded true leaf
Text definition: A true leaf that is in the vascular leaf expanding unfolded stage or vascular leaf post-expansion stage or vascular leaf senescent stage.

Label: non-senescing unfolded true leaf
Text definition: A unfolded true leaf that is in the vascular leaf expanding unfolded stage or vascular leaf post-expansion stage.

Label: senescing true leaf
Text definition: A unfolded true leaf that is in the vascular leaf senescent stage.

Label: immature unfolded true leaf
Text definition: A non-senescing unfolded true leaf that is in the vascular leaf expanding unfolded stage or vascular leaf expanded immature stage.

Label: mature true leaf
Text definition: A non-senescing unfolded true leaf that is in the vascular leaf mature stage.

Label: expanding unfolded true leaf
Text definition: An expanding true leaf that is in the vascular leaf expanding unfolded stage.

Label: expanded immature true leaf
Text definition: An immature unfolded true leaf that is in the vascular leaf expanded immature stage.

Label: expanding true leaf
Text definition: A true leaf that is in the vascular leaf expansion stage.

Label: reproductive structure
Text definition: A plant structure that is either a reproductive shoot system or a fruit.

Label: mature seed
Text definition: A seed that has participated in a seed maturation stage.

Label: senesced floral structure
Text definition: A floral structure that has completed floral organ senescence.

Label: non-senesced flower
Text definition: A flower in which all the petaloid floral organs floral organ have not completed floral organ senescence. Petaloid floral organs generally are the petals, sepal, or tepals, but may also be floral bracts or petaloid anthers anther.  For scoring phenology in grasses, petaloid floral organs can include lemma, palea or glume, even though a glume is not strictly a floral organ, because it encloses an inflorescence.

Label: unopened flower
Text definition: A 'non-senesced flower' that is in the 'unopened flower stage'.

Label: open flower
Text definition: A 'non-senesced flower' that is in the 'open flower stage'.

Label: pollen-releasing flower
Text definition: An 'open flower' that is in the 'pollen-releasing flower stage'.

Label: senesced flower
Text definition: A flower in which all of the petaloid floral organs floral organ have completed floral organ senescence. Petaloid floral organs generally are the petals, sepal, or tepals, but may also be floral bracts or petaloid anthers anther.  For scoring phenology in grasses, petaloid floral organs can include lemma, palea or glume, even though a glume is not strictly a floral organ, because it encloses an inflorescence.

Label: non-senesced flower head
Text definition: An inflorescence with at least one non-senesced flower. In the case of an unopened flower head, the non-senesced flower(s) might not be visible.

Label: unopened flower head
Text definition: A non-senesced flower head in which all flowers are unopened flowers unopened flower. The unopened flowers might not yet be visible.

Label: open flower head
Text definition: A non-senesced flower head with at least one open flower.

Label: pollen-releasing flower head
Text definition: An open flower head with at least one pollen-releasing flower.

Label: senesced flower head
Text definition: An inflorescence on which there are no remaining non-senesced flowers non-senesced flower.

Label: ripening fruit
Text definition: A simple fruit or compound fruit that is in the fruit ripening stage.

Label: unripe fruit
Text definition: A ripening fruit that is in the fruit unripe stage.

Label: ripe fruit
Text definition: A ripening fruit that is in the fruit ripe stage.

Label: fresh pollen cone
Text definition: A microsporangiate strobilus that has not yet completed the pollen-releasing strobilus stage.

Label: open pollen cone
Text definition: A fresh pollen cone that is in the open microsporangiate strobilus stage.

Label: pollen-releasing pollen cone
Text definition: A open pollen cone that is in the pollen-releasing strobilus stage.

Label: fresh seed cone
Text definition: A megasporangiate strobilus that has not yet been abscised and has not yet releases all of its seeds.

Label: ripening seed cone
Text definition: A fresh seed cone that is in the megasporangiate strobilus ripening stage.

Label: unripe seed cone
Text definition: A ripening seed cone that is in the megasporangiate strobilus unripe stage.

Label: ripe seed cone
Text definition: A ripening seed cone that is in the megasporangiate strobilus ripe stage.

Label: portion of a plant
Text definition: A plant structure that is not a whole plant; i.e. a proper part of a whole plant. Note that a portion of a plant need no longer be physically part of the whole plant from which it originated (e.g., a herbarium specimen).
